1.content:
Kitana was walking along the wall of the shaolin temple with Liu Kang. It was warm, and the sun was shining. They were both happy in each others company, and they both knew it. Then a green smoke ball shot through the air, knocking them both flat. Kitana landed on top of Lui Kang. Picking themselves up, they saw the unmistakable form of the deadly Ermac. The green energy around him attesting to his existence as a coalescence of souls. Floating onto the wall, he watched as Kitana and Liu Kang struggled to their feet. Taking their stances, they tensed as Ermac floated down. He lunged forwards, and the fight began.

A few minutes later, they were standing over the defeated Ermac. They were both sweating, but neither of them were seriously hurt. However, then Ermac began to make a strange noise. They both looked astonished at him- Ermac, the soul ninja, was laughing. Then his eyes glowed with green bale fire, and he exploded in a great mass of screeching souls. Both Kitana and Liu Kang were knocked flat by it. Falling unconscious, the world went black...
1.title: Battle with Ermac

11.content:
Kitana woke up. Liu Kang was still unconscious. Picking herself up, she felt dizzy. Walking over to the battlement on the wall, she looked over. As far as she could tell it was just a normal day on earth. She heard a groan and turned around. Liu Kang had just woken up. She walked over and helped him up.

"what happened?" asked Liu Kang
"I don't know" Kitana replied

With that she helped him up and walked back to their chambers together.
11.title: When they wake up...

However, Kitana's boots and underwear now fit Liu Kang's changed form. In the same way his clothes now fit Kitana. Therefore they decided to...

choices: We should go back to sleep

11112112.title: Wait for a bit

112.content:
That night both Kitana and Liu Kang felt the voice of Ermac in their heads. Whispering to them, he informed them that they would both be changed over the next few days. Shao Kahn had survived, and was going to punish them for their impudence by making them the next generation of his armies.

Smiling, they both saw him lean towards them and tap the on the forehead, declaring that it was Kahn's passing gift.
Both Liu Kang and Kitana shot bolt upright in bed. Looking at each other, they immediately saw what was wrong. Liu Kang had no adam's apple, whereas Kitana did, and Liu Kang's eyes glowed orange. Liu Kang opened his mouth, when Kitana put her finger to it.
"Your Hair..." She said.
Sure enough, Liu Kang's hair was growing longer, down to his shoulder, while Kitana's was retracting into her skull. Grasping at their scalps, Kitana looked at Liu Kang, a worried look in her eyes.
"We're changing into other people. But my hair is longer than that. We-re changing into someone else!"
112.title: The next morning
